SELECT tai.ID, tai.ACTIVITY_ABB, tai.ACTIVITY_NAME, tai.START_TIME, tai.END_TIME, tai.APPROVE_STATUS, tai.BUDGET, tai.XIAOXIANG_PAY_NUM, tai.ORG_NAME, tai.ORG_PAY_NUM, tai.MERCHANT_PAY_NUM, tai.ALARM_NUM, tai.ALARM_CONTENT, tai.ALARM_PHONE, tai.ALARM_EMAIL, tai.PAY_METHOD, tai.EFFECT_TIME, tai.LIMIT_NUM, tai.USE_RULE, tai.CONTRACT_PHOTO, tai.SHARE_FLAG, tai.SHARE_TITLE, tai.SHARE_CONTENT, tai.SHARE_PHOTO, tai.DETAIL_PHOTO, tai.CREATE_BY, tai.CREATE_TIME, tai.UPDATE_BY, tai.UPDATE_TIME, tai.DEL_FLAG, tai.STATUS, tai.AUDIT_REMARK, tai.AUDIT_TIME, tai.RANGE_NAME, tai.RANGE_CODE, tai.OPERATION_TYPE, su.USER_NAME as updateName FROM T_ACTIVITY_INFO tai LEFT JOIN SYS_USER su on tai.UPDATE_BY = su.USER_ID and su.DEL_FLAG = 0
and tai.ACTIVITY_ABB like concat(concat('%', #{activityAbb}), '%') and tai.ACTIVITY_NAME like concat(concat('%', #{activityName}), '%')
and ((to_char(tai.START_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{startTime} and to_char(tai.START_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endTime}) or (to_char(tai.START_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{startTime} and to_char(tai.END_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{endTime}) or (to_char(tai.END_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{startTime} and to_char(tai.END_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{startTime}))
and tai.APPROVE_STATUS = #{approveStatus} and tai.STATUS = #{status} and tai.OPERATION_TYPE = #{operationType} and su.USER_NAME like concat(concat('%', #{updateName}), '%')
and to_char(tai.CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= #{params.beginTime}
and to_char(tai.CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= #{params.endTime}
and tai.DEL_FLAG = 0
order by tai.CREATE_TIME desc
select from T_ACTIVITY_INFO where ID = #{id} and DEL_FLAG = 0
